entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
